results.title: Simvastatin attenuated sickness behavior and fever in a murine model of endotoxemia.
results.text_hl: This study investigated the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Sick_Sinus_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012804 @@@sickness syndrome@@@ by systemic administration of @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@lipopolysaccharide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@).

citations.NLM: Oliveira MK, Dos Santos RS, Cabral LDM, Vilela FC, Giusti-Paiva A. Simvastatin attenuated sickness behavior and fever in a murine model of endotoxemia. Life Sci. 2020 Aug 1;254():117701. PMID: 32387414
